title: Systematic Federal worker targeting and Schedule F implementation - TTT Article 99
description:
Research systematic corruption pattern: Federal worker targeting and Schedule F implementation

SOURCE: Trump Tyranny Tracker Article 99
TITLE: Trump Tyranny Tracker: Day 215-217
URL: https://trumptyrannytracker.substack.com/p/trump-tyranny-tracker-day-215-217

CORRUPTION PATTERN ANALYSIS:
This research priority focuses on documenting the systematic nature of federal worker targeting and schedule f implementation, 
moving beyond isolated incidents to reveal coordinated campaigns and institutional capture mechanisms.

KEY RESEARCH QUESTIONS:
- What specific Schedule F implementation mechanisms were deployed?
- Which federal agencies experienced the most systematic purges?
- How were loyalty tests administered and by whom?
- What coordination existed between agencies in targeting career employees?
- Which contractors or consulting firms assisted in implementation?
- How did targeted workers organize resistance efforts?

TIMELINE FOCUS:
- Document specific dates and coordination meetings
- Identify key actors and their systematic roles
- Map institutional capture progression
- Track resistance and countermeasures
- Connect to broader kleptocratic patterns

INDICATORS FROM SOURCE:
- Potential dates: 2026, 2016, 2017
- Key actors mentioned: To be researched
